Package com.sap.cloud.sdk.datamodel.odata.utility

Class SimpleNamingStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.sap.cloud.sdk.datamodel.odata.utility.AbstractNamingStrategy
com.sap.cloud.sdk.datamodel.odata.utility.SimpleNamingStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
NamingStrategy
@Beta public class SimpleNamingStrategy extends AbstractNamingStrategy
Represents the default NamingStrategy implementation, which generates syntactically correct Java names without doing any additional modifications.
